item.title: By: Jonathan
item.dc:creator: Jonathan
item.description: Many thanks Dean. I always find this sort of diagram really helps to show quite how obvious Simpson's paradox is when you see it in this form, however weird it may be when explained: https://miro.medium.com/max/1516/1*Dj23DyuR9AAD1IkrHUWoJg.png
item.content:encoded: Many thanks Dean. I always find this sort of diagram really helps to show quite how obvious Simpson’s paradox is when you see it in this form, however weird it may be when explained: https://miro.medium.com/max/1516/1*Dj23DyuR9AAD1IkrHUWoJg.png
